00008 bool makeDirectory(string path) {
00009 #if MAVEN_OS == 1
00010         system((string("mkdir -p \"") + path + "\"").c_str());
00011 #elif MAVEN_OS == 2
00012         system((string("mkdir \"") + path + "\"").c_str());
00013 #endif
00014         return true;
00015 }
